title: Serif Typeface ID
content:
I can’t seem to identify this serif font.

 [‹ ID Fancy Font please](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39521 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bloomingdales corporate face - customized ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Raph} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7117 "Go to next forum topic")
author: b_keith

comments.content:
Looks very Zapfish, although the closest face of his I could find is Orion, which is not an exact match.

- Lex

That’s not Adobe Serif is it?

No? didn’t think so really, bye!
